com.example.noteation.helpers

Class GeofenceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • com.example.noteation.helpers.GeofenceHelper

  • public class GeofenceHelper
extends android.content.ContextWrapper
    This class is in charge of the functions used for the creating geofences in the app

      com.google.android.gms.location.Geofence getGeofence(java.lang.String id, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng, float radius, int transitionTypes)
      Creates a new geofence with the parameters sent that checks the transition every 5 seconds and that never expires

    • Method Detail

      • getGeofencingRequest

        public com.google.android.gms.location.GeofencingRequest getGeofencingRequest(java.util.ArrayList<com.google.android.gms.location.Geofence> geofenceList)
        Creates a geofence request with all the geofences given (they will all trigger when the user enters the a geofence)
        Parameters:
        geofenceList - The list of geofences to add to the request
        Returns:
        {GeofencingRequest} The geofence request with all of the geofences in it

      • getGeofence

        public com.google.android.gms.location.Geofence getGeofence(java.lang.String id,
                                                            com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng,
                                                            float radius,
                                                            int transitionTypes)
        Creates a new geofence with the parameters sent that checks the transition every 5 seconds and that never expires
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the geofence request
        latLng - The coordinates (latitude and longitude) of the geofence
        radius - The radius of the geofence
        transitionTypes - The transition type for triggering the geofence
        Returns:
        {Geofence} The new created geofence

      • getPendingIntent

        public android.app.PendingIntent getPendingIntent()
        Checks if the pending intent isn't null, if it isn't it returns the geofence pending intent that goes to the "GeofenceBroadcastReceiver"
        Returns:
        {PendingIntent} The pending intent of the geofence request
